alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Gilmer; Ritchie; Wirt (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 5:49PM EDT until July 18 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston West Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Calhoun County in north central West Virginia... Southern Ritchie County in northwestern West Virginia... Northwestern Gilmer County in north central West Virginia... East central Wirt County in northwestern West Virginia... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 549 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles east of Elizabeth, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Grantsville, Smithville, Big Springs, Berea, Brohard, Macfarlan, Burnt House and Munday. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
